title: FS - T206 Hindu Nap Lajoie Portrait SGC 1

posts.post_title: FS - T206 Hindu Nap Lajoie Portrait SGC 1
posts.post_content:
Tough front/back combo. Card still presents very well despite its technical flaws. There is no damage to the case. The marks are only on the surface and are not as noticeable in hand.

$775 shipped/insured PP/FF or check ok too. Thanks for your consideration.

Bump. Open to offers. Thanks for looking.
